pesticide.PPE: Coveralls over short-sleeved shirt and short pants; Waterproof gloves; Chemical-resistant footwear plus socks; Chemical-resistant headgear for overhead exposure; Chemical-resistant apron when cleaning equipment, mixing or loading; NIOSH-approved particulate filtering facepiece respirator with any N, R or P filter or NIOSH-approved elastomeric particulate respirator with any N, R, or P filter for mixers, loaders, and applicators using mechanically-pressurized handguns to orchards and nurseries.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a Poison Control Center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a Poison Control Center or doctor or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-800-992-5994 for emergency medical treatment information.
